caption: My husband said “this may be better than Byblos!” And if you know, you know 😉  Our experience was amazing! The good was great, the service was impeccable, and the drinks were strong. We had such an incredible meal.  We began with the choose 3 platter. We chose the hummus, tatziki, and red pepper hummus. I have a gluten allergy so they included some cucumber. We had the scallop carpaccio and it was incredible! We had the sea bass for our main course with the roasted beets and potatoes. We also had the octopus. Delish! I’d go here again!

Stopped here after shopping and looked at the menu but when we talked to the hostess we found out it was Happy Hour. Sat at the bar and had great service. Ordered the chicken gyro and taverna fries which were both delicious. Loved the Grecian atmosphere here and will definitely come back!

Perfect! The food, the service, the music! We went in for brunch and Mr. Rafa was super attentive, he made suggestions and recommendations.... the food was fresh and delicious, and the drinks! Omg the drinks! Come check it out for yourself!!!!

(Translated by Google) What a great job the chef, everything was exquisite! The spreads, the octopus, the scallops are like butter in the mouth, the ceviche has a very special marinade, the Greek salad ... everything was at its exact point of flavor, congratulations! Highly recommended. A very nice atmosphere, especially outside.  (Original) Que gran labor del chef, todo estuvo exquisito! Las cremas untables, el pulpo, los scallops son como mantequilla en la boca, el ceviche tiene una marinada muy especial, la ensalada griega.. todo estuvo en su punto exacto de sabor, felicidades! Muy recomendado. Un ambiente muy bonito, sobretodo en el exterior.
Amazing place the prices are plus the average but worths. Good music good atmosphere and staff Onlyfans @fitqueen
The restaurant prices is almost unreadable, should be illegal, it’s hiding info from the client. Should increase pricing size on the font, unreadable. Can you read the pricing ?
Best sea bass I've ever eaten! Great food, great service!

Great brunch place. I had the frittata which was perfect. I shared the baklava french toast with my girlfriend and it was pretty disappointing. The inside of the french toast was raw (not sure if by mistake or by design). The caramelized apple toppings were good, but generally I wouldn't order that dish again. The service was great! All in all we had a good experience and we'll definitely be back to try other dishes!
Not worth visiting, mediocre food and service. Menu is way overpriced for the offerings and overall restaurant is poorly designed, there are way too many better options around.

Super disrespectful, hostess confirmed a reservation and on arrival said sorry our kitchen is closed. After I walked around for an hour. She’s a really an idiot. Total lack of communication on the restaurants end. I would leave them 0 stars but that’s not even an option.
Best Greek food ever! Highly recommend.

This place was the worst place we’ve experienced in Miami. The service was sooooo slow. The waiter messed up on our order several times. A family that was with us left cause after 1.5 hours the waiter forgot to order his meal. The octopus was rubbery and bland. The kids pizza was microwaved. For the prices they suggest you would think everything would be fresh. This place is not worth your time or your money. There’s so many options in Miami, choose another place.
Awesome appetizers, fish and steak,  great ambience!
Great broccolini and great service!

We just can’t win with the baby for the restaurant we want to sit outside 20 people sit outside and the same time and the manager tell me I can sit outside with the baby because we open at 5o’clock but everybody sitting outside do I have a lunch Because the coronavirus I don’t want to sit inside because I’m with the baby in the men’s or push me out and tell me we don’t have space saw it and everybody sitting in the same time He is very bad attitude and very bad conversation with him I try to explain in a couple of times we want to sit outside it doesn’t response very bad attitude very bad professional
Bad service, expensive and small plates

The restaurant good located, BUT..... the hosts were very poorly educated, we arrived at 10 minutes before 5pm and they told us that we had to wait 10 minutes because happy hour was ending, once we asked for the table after waiting the required time, we asked to sit in the patio and they told us that they were completely full and we checked and all the tables were empty, we were forced to sit inside and to make matters worse, they changed the menu where we did not see what we wanted to order. I really do not recommend the place, bad attention, badly educated the host, the waitress as if he did not care about the situation, too expensive. I DEFINITELY DO NOT RECOMMEND IT AT ALL...!!!! We prefer Mandolin in Midtown..!!!
Phenomenal food, service, and atmosphere

I almost don't want to reveal that this place is a true gem, but alas I must share my exceptional experiences here. The first time I dined here, I made a reservation ahead of time, and while they couldn't accommodate me for a table outside, the bar was very inviting. We fully enjoyed all of our dishes. My girlfriend and I ordered the trio of spreads, little gem salad, zucchini chips, sea bass, and orzo side. The fish stood out to me with the light char of the wood grilled oven, and the very moist and flavorful firm flesh. Service was excellent! The second time I dined there was without a reservation, for a date night with my man, on a busy Saturday night. The bar area was spaced out, and very comfortable, about two seats between parties. I felt very comfortable without a mask on while eating at the bar, as the windows are open and the space feels airy. The service at the bar was wonderful, and very upbeat. They were very attentive, and friendly. Overall, two consistently very wonderful visits to this gem in Aventura. Make sure to book ahead, and request indoors or outdoors in your reservation. It's a wonderful spot!
Beautiful place. Excellent service. Delicious food. Will definitely come back.
Really good Greek food inside aventura mall. The menu has few plates but all of them are very good. The experience (a plate) it’s worth a 100% the price and quality.
Great food and service

First of all, it's a Michael Mina restaurant, so you know it's going to be great. And it is! We started off with the grilled octopus which was delicious. My wife had one of the ceviches, which she loved. I had the falafel bowl. So good. And I washed it all down with a refreshing Mythos Greek beer. Not your usual mall restaurant,  I assure you!

Came because we discovered that they have a happy hour. We had the ornos gyro and you can have it with either steak or lemon chicken. My wife ordered the steak and I ordered the lemon chicken. I am iron intolerant so I was a bit surprised when the one in front of me, when I bit into it, was the steak and hers was the chicken. their staff need to take food deliveries a bit more seriously especially when dietary constraints are to be considered. you can only have a happy hour at the bar and of course there is limited seating because of current conditions. The happy hour is only 2 hours from 4:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m.. The gyro that we got was $12 and the price did not change if it was steak or chicken period in my opinion the steak is a good value but some of it was a little bit fatty and chewy and not thinly sliced. You can see the size of the gyro in the picture of this review.

Very disappointed, this my second time over there , the first was good so decided to go again , disappointed!! If you are looking for Greek food , forget about that , they have the name but the food is far from Greek food. The worst thing is they aloud to there customer to smoke in the patio, I asked and they said that place is not smoking area but it seems like the manager is friendly with this customer, it’s totally don’t understand that it’s happened. They will not see me again , maybe it’s not big issue but it’s there problem, there a lot of options outside.
It’s a great experience.the ambiance is very welcoming and charming.  Amazing wine and food.Abdellah my server is extremely knowledgeable and makes great recommendations.Thank you we will be back.

Delicious Greek good at the mall! I ate here with my wife and 2 kids shortly after opening. They graciously sat us in the patio away from other guests, so our kids could be kids and stay covid safe. Our server was very knowledgeable and had a great grasp on the menu. The food was fresh, clean, light- even after a big meal we felt full but not stuffed. Gorgeous decor, loved this spot!

This Restaurant was OUTSTANDING and the services was SPECTACULAR.  The Food was soo flavorful and reminded me so much of Greece. Thanks for an AMAZZZING Experience. Scotty Wrapz on the Mapz @vapecentralgroup We are the Custom Tech Kings...
This is a very avarage place. Definitely not coming back. Food is 5 out of 10. Service is ok.

What an amazing new restaurant! Ornos really hits the spot with service, food, ambiance, and drinks. I am so excited to come back. They have a fish sommelier that walks you through a the chefs fish selections of the day on a beautifully presented cart. This is exactly what we need in Aventura. Thank you Ornos team! See you again soon!
Tastiest food we have had in a while.  Highly recommend.
